Short Courses by IVAT
=====================

by [powerpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/powerpic/ "Posts by powerpic")
 | Sep 14, 2016 | [POWER](https://fke.utm.my/category/power/)

![advertisement-short-course1a](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/Advertisement-Short-Course1a.jpg)

The Institute of High Voltage and High Current (IVAT), Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (UTM), will organise two short courses as follows:

*   Two-Day Hands-On Course on Measurement Uncertainty for MS ISO/IEC 17025 Accreditation
*   Two-Day Hands-On Course on Internal Quality Audit for MS ISO/IEC 17025 Accreditation

Fee: RM2000 per person per course  
Venue: IVAT, UTM, Johor Bahru  
Date: To be announced  
The dates of the courses are dependent upon demands. Group discounts are available. Please contact IVAT for further details.

Contact Us:  
INSTITUTE OF HIGH VOLTAGE AND HIGH CURRENT (IVAT)  
Blok P06  
Universiti Teknologi Malaysia  
81310 Johor Bahru  
Johor  
Email: ivat@engineering.utm.my  
Tel: +60-7-5535615
